name: Small Arms
description: Single Player, Xbox Live Multiplayer 1-4, HD (High Definition). Can’t get enough brawling and shooting action? Buy Small Arms™ to unlock all the levels, characters, and mini games. Get linked into the Small Arms community and earn a Six Degrees of Small Arms achievement! Can you beat the single-player mission? Conquer your friends on your couch or over Xbox Live®? Are you ready to check the leaderboards and claim your bragging rights? Then don’t delay - buy Small Arms now! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
